document.full_text: pakistan's army threatened on thursday to reconsider its anti-terrorism cooperation with the united states if washington carried out another unilateral attack like the killing of osama bin laden.
document.title: pakistan threatens u.s. on cooperation if more raids
lines_and_colors: pakistan's army threatened on thursday to reconsider its anti-terrorism cooperation with the united states if washington carried out another unilateral attack like the killing of osama bin laden.
